text: Fandango is a 1985 American road comedy movie directed by Kevin Reynolds and starring Kevin Costner, Suzy Amis, Judd Nelson, Sam Robards, Chuck Bush, Glenne Headly, E. G. Dailly. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Kevin Reynolds Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Fandango (1985 movie)
